question_details.resolution_criteria: This question resolves as **Yes** if the total number of expulsions or removals [reported](https://www.ice.gov/spotlight/statistics) by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) for FY 2025 is at least double the number shown for FY 2024 at the time. If the number reported for FY 2025 is less than double that of FY 2024, this question resolves as **No**.
question_details.fine_print:
The number shown at the time of this question for FY 2024 is 271,484 (271,484 [Title 8](https://uscode.house.gov/browse/prelim@title8\&edition=prelim) Removals and 0 [Title 42](https://uscode.house.gov/browse/prelim@title42\&edition=prelim) Expulsions). Following the resolution of this question, no further revisions to either FY 2024 or FY 2025 numbers will be taken into account.

In addition to Titles 8 and 42, any other authorities unambiguously included by ICE as part of its total number of reported deportations, expulsions or removals will also count.
